Name: PLA
Label: Plasma
Definition: amount of drug found in plasma

Name: ULU
Label: Uninvolved Lung
Definition: amount of drug found in uninvolved lung \n (part of the lung where there is no lesion).

Name: RIM
Label: Rim (of Lesion)
Definition: amount of drug found in Rim (of lesion)

Name: OCS
Label: Outer Caseum
Definition: amount of drug found in outer caseum

Name: ICS
Label: Inner Caseum
Definition: amount of drug found in inner caseum

Name: SLU
Label: Standard Lung
Definition: amount of drug found in standard \n lung EXCLUDING THE LESION

Name: SLE
Label: Standard Lesion
Definition: amount of drug found in standard lesion \n (JUST THE LESION, NO LUNG)

Name: cLogP
Label: cLogP
Definition: octanol:water partition coefficient. This is the logarithm \n of the concentration of drug in octanol (oil) and water - it's a \n measure of lipohilicity/hydrophoicity of the drug.

Name: huPPB
Label: Human Plasma Binding
Definition: The fraction of drug concentration that binds to human \n plasma proteins, (1 - huPPB) is then the free \m concentration of the drug.

Name: muPPB
Label: Mouse Plasma Binding
Definition: the fraction of drug concentration that binds to mouse \n plasma proteins, (1 - muPPB) is then the free \n concentration of the drug.

Name: MIC_Erdman
Label: MIC Erdman Strain
Definition: Minimum Inhibitory Concentration of Erdman strain. \n This is the minimum drug concentration that inhibits the growth \n of the bacteria, in this case the Erdman strain of Mycobacterium tuberculosis.

Name: MICserumErd
Label: MIC Erdman Strain with Serum
Definition: Minimum Inhibitory Concentration of Erdman Strain WITH \n serum added (serum added demonstrates a more similar to the \n environment the drug acts in, in-vivo).

Name: MIC_Rv
Label: MIC Rv Strain
Definition: MIC for H37Rv strain of M. tuberculosis.

Name: Caseum_binding
Label: Caseum Binding
Definition: fraction of drug concentration that is bound to the constituents \n of the caseum (caseum is at the center of the necrotic granuloma) (% unbound)

Name: MacUptake
Label: Macrophage Uptake (Ratio)
Definition:
rate of uptake of drug molecules by macrophages. (I/E concentration ratio). 
 MacUptake is unitless (I / E concentration ratio)--this could refer to 
 concentrations inside and outside the macrophage I intracellular / E extracellular. 
 The time at which the measurement is taken is probably a standard one.

Name: dose_int
Label: Dosage Interval
Definition: When the dose is adminstered (QD reflects once \n per day, and BID reflects twice per day)

Name: level
Label: Level of Drug
Definition: The level the drug was measured.(Either occurs at \n the highest level (cmax), or lowest level (trough)
